text: Kaadu makki koros Nabii Mucammadak ġzak ái :Mucammadow ninni diini cabba hayneh ku-diinil koo kataynek qarab qeebih nel kobxeleeh ni- baaxok nee ayyaaqe-le itte, kaadu saayah yan caramay ummaan caxâ mixuy rizqhi (quusih) keenih yakke fan kak baahan arac keenih maabinninoo? ni-xaquk kinnih immay keenik maggo mari mayaaxiga ama niqmat yakkeh gide
